data: On the afternoon of the second Thursday in March, 1916, I responded to an invitation to the regular meeting of a small psychical research society.
Jap Herron: A Novel Written from the Ouija Board
Twain, Mark (Spirit), 1835-1910 [Dubious author]; Hutchings, Emily Grant [Author of introduction, etc.]
